name: Just a Spoonful
description:
Losing interest in all that’s around you, what you once enjoyed and your life as a whole, it’s no uncommon thing. Giving up shouldn’t be how you solve it though, ever.

This is a story about an individual who’s going through exactly that, learning about the so-called “Spoon Theory” and gathering these spoons in a dream in order to regain their lost courage to take the first step toward living again.
